title: No Voice Mail Notifications
content:
I have a Pixel 4XL and recently found that people have left me voicemails and I get no notification of any kind that they are there.  I've gone into "Notifications" on my phone app and checked "alerting" and "pop on screen"    Nothing.  
I can retrieve the voicemails by holding the (1) button down on my touchpad.  No problem there.  It's just finding out if anyone has left me a voicemail.  
THANKS
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
